medical: EXAM:MRI OF THE RIGHT ANKLE CLINICAL:Pain. FINDINGS: The bone marrow demonstrates normal signal intensity. There is no evidence of bone contusion or fracture. There is no evidence of joint effusion. Tendinous structures surrounding the ankle joint are intact. No abnormal mass or fluid collection is seen surrounding the ankle joint. IMPRESSION: NORMAL MRI OF THE RIGHT ANKLE.
